title: River Otters
description: River Otters introduces students to some amazingly athletic creatures. The text describes the physical appearance and habits of river otters. Detailed photographs enhance the information provided by the text. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details as well as how to locate the simple subject.
reviewWords: amazing, breath, catching, fur, river otters, swimming

awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
grammar: Simple Subject                : Recognize and use simple subjects
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word all
